title: Kulup
overview: This is the poignant love story of a middle-class couple. Their happy life takes a devastating turn when the wife is diagnosed with incurable pancreatic cancer. Struggling with emotional and financial turmoil, the husband seeks help from relatives but faces rejection, forcing him to sell his ancestral home. As his wife battles cancer, he witnesses another patient's harrowing struggles, making him question whether to continue her treatment. Ultimately, he honors her final wishâ€”a world tour together-choosing her happiness over further suffering. After her death, the husband wrestles with grief and financial hardship but eventually reclaims their ancestral home. On the journey back, he shares the story with their young daughter, who was too little to understand her mother's struggles.
